item.description:
In February, the meeting o' the bloggers will happen on Thursday, February 16th at 7pm. Sometimes there's a specific topic and presentation/discussion, other times it's an open discussion about more or less blog related topics. If there's something in particular you'd like to talk about, make note of it in the discussion forum or send the organizer a note via the "contact me" link on the left.

After the meeting, the group often will get together for dinner at a nearby restaurant in Harvard Square or Porter Square (Cambridge).

Pesky meetup is always auto-creating our event listings. Please note that this monthly meetup happens at the Berkman Center on the third Thursday of each month.

For more information, see http://blogs.law.harv...

group.name: The Greater Boston Area Weblogger Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Weblogger February Meetup
